item.title: Juno Cam Image Processing
item.description: This is a program I wrote last November that assembles raw image data coming from the Juno Spacecraft. When I started, I thought it would be cool if this program ran in a browser window. When I finished, I was certain that this program should have been a desktop application. The final images this program produces are quite large; well over 20mb, showing the individual red, green, blue, and composite brightness data. Here's a block of text ripped from the JunoCam website that does a good job of explaining why these images need to be reconstructed:
